attributes.action: Stop the ban on tents for homeless people
attributes.background: Let homeless people live in till accommodation is found

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not restrict the use of tents by homeless people: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/650799

Do not restrict charities from providing tents for homeless people: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/650692
